## [An experimental study of Mandarin-speaking children’s acquisition of recursion under a formal definition/classification system for recursion](publication/yang2022experimental.qmd)

subtypes of 2-level recursive sequences.

## [Semantic integration of multidimensional perceptual information in L1 sentence comprehension](publication/bai2022semantic.qmd)

<table>
<tr>
<td width="40%">
<img src="image/bai2022semantic.jpg" style="max-width: 95%">
</td>
<td width="60%">
Published in *Language and Cognition*, 2022.

We provide the first experimental evidence of how multidimensional perceptual information
(color and shape) was processed during online sentence comprehension in Mandarin.

Recommended citation: Bai, B., Yang, C. and Fan, J. (2022).
Semantic integration of multidimensional perceptual information in L1 sentence comprehension.
Language and Cognition, 14(1): 109--130.
[DOI](https://doi.org/10.1017/langcog.2021.24)
